title: A Barber in Kabul

o LLC, below image, in black ink: [A Barber in Kabul
description: two men wearing turbans; man at R looks out an open panel in a door, under a sign reading \"BARBER\" in two languages, with images of a razor and brush, comb and scissors; man at L looks out from behind a curtain covering opening to L of door
